title: Ziina Purple: Fintech Subscription Case Study
blurb: Built a go-to-market strategy for Ziina’s premium subscription, analyzing fintech trends, defining benefits, and integrating the Ziina Card.

title: Premier League Player Metrics → Match Outcome
blurb: Built logistic models in Python using offensive stats to predict win/draw/loss; compared validation set, K-Fold, and LOOCV performance.
